Judul: STUDI PENERAPAN KONSEP KONSOLIDASI LAHAN DALAM PENGEMBANGAN DAN PERBAIKAN KAWASAN PERMUKIMAN DI KELURAHAN TAMANSARI Studi Kasus: RT 06 RW 15
Abstrak:
The 2004 Aceh Eartquake and tsunami was an enormous disaster. This earthquake destroy almost all infrastructure in the coastal area and killed   numberous amount of civilian. Mitigation is needed to prevent or reduce the effect of disaster. Learning post-seismic phase of the earthquake cycle can help the mitigation act, by learning it we can predict the earthquake cycle and the deformation. If the earthquake cycle is known, it can be usefull for mitigation act in the future.         
 

Global Postitioning System (GPS) can be used to observed the post-seismic deformation because its accuracy. GPS can gives a milimeter (mm) accuracy, so it is the right methods to observed post-seismic deformation. Acording to the observation in 2007 until 2009, there are post-seismic deformation around 5 to 15cm per year. The post-seismic modelling result is a deformation estimation in the    subduction zone.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing : Ir. Haryo Winarso, M.Eng., Ph.D
Kata Kunci: Aceh Eartquake and tsunami, tsunami aceh, konsolidasi lahan, pemukiman, Global Postitioning System (GPS), mitigasi bencana, aksi mitigasi bencana
